title: New England Hockey Rinks
name: New England Hockey Rinks
description:
A Map by Sharkpac

Driving to Youth Hockey Game? Locate rinks within the Boston and New England area here.

properties.name: Billerica-Hallenborg Memorial Pavillion
properties.description: Posted by SharkpacGood St.Billerica, MA 01821From 495: Take exit #35C-B-A/US-3 onto the highway toward BURLINGTON - go 1.7 mi .Merge onto US-3 SOUTH - go 0.9 mi .Take exit #29/RT-129 onto BILLERICA RD - go 0.6 mi .BILLERICA RD becomes CHELMSFORD RD[RT-129] - go 1.0 mi .Turn Right to follow RT-129 - go 1.2 mi .RT-129 becomes BOSTON RD[RT-3A] - go 0.6 mi .Turn Right on GOOD ST you’ll see a sign for Hallenborg at the corner of Good Street and 3A. The rink is the 3rd set buildings on the left, behind the Police/Fire station and the High School.

properties.description: Posted by Sharkpac20 Bedford Park, Bridgewater, MA 02324

properties.name: Chelsmsford Forum, North Chelsmsford, MA
properties.description: Posted by Sharkpac2 Brick Kiln Rd. North Billerica, MA 01862 From South Route 128 to Route 3 North Take Exit 29 (Route 129) At end of ramp take a left Take an immediate left onto Brick Kiln Road Arena is on the left From North and Rt. 495 Route 3 South Take Exit 29 (Route 129) At end of ramp take a right Take first left onto Brick Kiln Road Arena is on the left

properties.name: Dracut Ice Huts
properties.description: Posted by Sharkpac45 Tennis Plaza Rd. Dracut, MA 01826-3343This is definitely NOT one of the nicer rinks in the area, but at least it\'s FRIGID Cold. 1 3/4 rinks. The 2nd rink is a partial size, used mostly for practices. For any mapquest users, use 1734 Lakeview Ave. as final destination. From Rte 3 Chelmsford : Take Exit 32 (Drum Hill) and Follow Drum Hill rd into Lowell, continue straight(turns into Wood St.-Lowell)go over Bridge and bear right onto Pawtucket Blvd.(Rte113) Follow up to Mammouth Rd. and take left(MacDonald\'s on Left), follow Mammouth Rd. into Dracut and continue until you come to Lakeview Rd. (Dunkin Donuts on Left) Take right onto Lakeview until you see RK PLAZA on right, turn right into RK PLAZA (at lights-Tennis plaza rd.) Rink is on Left at end of Plaza.

properties.name: Fitzpatrick Arena, Springfield, MA
properties.description: Posted by SharkpacTake the Mass Pike (Rt. 90) West Take the I-291 exit towards Springfield (Exit #6) Merge onto I-291 South Take the I-91 North exit towards W. Springfield (Exit #1B) Merge onto I-91 North. Take the I-391 North exit towards Chicopee/Holyoke Ctr., (Exit #12). Merge onto I-391 North. Take the High St. exit. Continue on Resnic Blvd/Ross Ave Turn left on Maple St.

properties.name: Hockeytown USA Saugus, MA
properties.description: Posted by Hendonp953 Broadway Street 01906Saugus: Hockeytown USA 953 Broadway Street Route 1 Saugus Ma. 01906 From Route 128/ I 95: Take Exit Route 1 South several miles Hockeytown is on the right just past the Hilltop Steak House. From Route 1 North: Follow rte. 1 North toward Saugus. Watch for Hockeytown on left. Get off and reverse direction.

properties.name: Lawrence Valley Forum
properties.description: Posted by Sharkpac654 S Union St Lawrence, MA 01843From Route 495: Take exit 41B. Follow for 1/8 of a mile keep right when road splits. Go over bridge and the rink is on the right.

properties.name: Middlesex School Hockey Rink
properties.description: Posted by Hendonp 1400 Lowell Road 01742Pratt Memorial Rink Middlesex School 1400 Lowell Road Concord Ma. 01742 From Route 128: Take Exit 29 (Rte. 2 West) to second set of lights. Go straight and follow signs for Concord Ctr. At Colonial Inn take a sharp right and then another sharp right onto Lowell Road. Follow to Middlesex School 2.6 miles.

properties.name: Nashoba Valley Olympia, Boxborough, MA 01709
properties.description: Posted by SharkpacNashoba Valley Olympia, Boxborough, MA 01709From 128 - Route 128 to Route 2 West. Pass the Concord Prison, Around the Rotary, continuing on Route 2 West. After the rotary, you’ll see signs for Route 111 West. It is a left exit. It appears on the sign kinda like a map. Take that exit. Continue straight, following route 111. Somewhere along the line it will suddenly turn to Route 111 North. Don’t get nervous when the signs suddenly change. As long as you stay straight, you’re all right. The rink is about 3 miles down on your left. It is right after the “Welcome to Boxborough” sign. If you reach I 495, you’ve gone too far.

properties.name: Salem Ice Center
properties.description: Posted by Sharkpac60 Lowell Road, Salem, New HampshireFrom the South Take 93 N to Exit 1 - Rockingham Park Boulevard Follow signs for Mall Road. Proceed up ramp to set of lights and take a right. Follow Mall Road until you can no longer go straight. At those lights, take a left onto 38 S. Go straight through two sets of lights. The Icenter is a half-mile down on the right. From the North Take 93 S to Exit 2 - Salem/Pelham Take a left at the light at the end of the ramp At the second set of lights, take a left onto Stiles road. Go straight and the Icenter is a half-mile down on the right.

properties.name: Valley Sports Arena, Concord MA
properties.description: Posted by Sharkpac 2320 Main St. Concord, MAFrom Route 2 West: Take Rte 62 West just after Emerson Hospital. Follow into town and bear left at 99 Restaurant. Rink is on Rte 62 West approximately 3.1 miles down on the right.
